message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,200,000.  It's a unique opportunity, and I believe this price reflects its value.  Let me know your thoughts.
Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of your product, but I am only able to offer $1,100,000. This is the maximum I can afford at this time. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $1,100,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1,150,000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. I'm confident that we can reach an agreement.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter your offer with $1,125,000. I hope this brings us closer to a mutually agreeable price.
